citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1430 on
21June2023 at the listed site address at RDU.
Upon inquiry at the listed address, the inspector spoke with another handler who now occupies that suite at that site
address. This handler stated that Worldwide Flight Services was not present at this site location and was not currently
active at RDU to their knowledge.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1430 on 
21June2023 at the listed site address at RDU.  
 
Upon inquiry at the listed address, the inspector spoke with another handler who now occupies that suite at that site 
address. This handler stated that Worldwide Flight Services was not present at this site location and was not currently 
active at RDU to their knowledge. 
 
 
End Section
